name: Orange Fox
short_description: A clever little fox with sharp folds.
description: A clever little fox sitting upright, its sharp folds capturing the sly tilt of its ears and the mischief in its stance.

name: Green Bird
short_description: A tall, angular bird ready to leap.
description: A tall, angular bird with its head raised high, almost as if about to leap into the sky.

name: Grey Elephant
description: Strong yet gentle, this folded elephant stands proudly, trunk lowered in calm elegance.

name: Blue Rabbit
description: Perched on alert hind legs, its long ears stretch high as if listening for the faintest sound.

name: Yellow Duck
description: A playful duck floating in stillness, with a rounded body and folded beak pointed curiously forward.

name: Brown Bear
description: A sturdy bear figure, its solid folds suggesting strength and slow, steady movement.

name: Pink Rabbit
description: A softer, lighter bunny sitting neatly, ears perked up with a sense of curiosity.

name: Golden Dog
short_description: Loyal dog, ready to wag tail.
description: A loyal companion, folded into a pose that looks ready to wag its tail.

name: Blue Crow
description: Sleek and angular, this bird leans forward as though about to hop into flight.

name: Tan Cat
description: A small, upright cat with pointy ears and a folded posture that radiates quiet watchfulness.

name: Green Frog
description: Low to the ground with wide folds, ready to spring forward at any moment.

name: Orange Crane
description: A timeless origami classic, wings spread wide in graceful balance.

name: Green Turtle
description: Steady and enduring, its folded shell forms a perfect hexagonal back.

name: Red Butterfly
description: Wings open in symmetry, delicate folds suggesting a fleeting dance in the air.

name: Yellow Bird
description: A tiny folded songbird, perched as if about to chirp.

name: Gray Fish
description: Sleek and streamlined, folded in a way that makes it seem to glide through invisible waters.
